formsValidations.samePassword: New password must be different from old password
formsValidations.apiKeyMinRequirements: Label must be at least 3 characters long
formsValidations.qrCodeRequirements: Invalid authenticator code. Check code you entered.

formsValidations.invalidEmailWithAction: Invalid email address. Check the email you entered.

formsValidations.cannotBridgeDecimals: Decimal values cannot be bridged out.

offline: We are currently experiencing some connectivity issues. You will not be able to place orders. Outstanding limit orders will still be filled.
